targets.query: SELECT ip,mean("resp") FROM "def"."vm.health" WHERE ("id" =~ /^$UUID$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("value") FROM "def"."vm.mem.free_perc" WHERE ("resource_id" =~ /^$UUID$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT 100 - last("value") FROM "def"."mem.free_perc" WHERE ("resource_id" =~ /^$UUID$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  instance_id =~ /^$UUID$/ AND  src_ip != ''AND  dst_ip != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), proto, dst_port fill(0)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  instance_id =~ /^$UUID$/ AND  src_ip != ''AND  dst_ip != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip, dst_ip fill(null)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  instance_id =~ /^$UUID$/ AND direction = 'ingress' AND  src_ip != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip fill(null)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  instance_id =~ /^$UUID$/ AND port_type = 'fixed' AND direction = 'egress' AND  dst_ip != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), dst_ip fill(null)

SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  instance_id =~ /^$UUID$/ AND dst_ip != '' AND src_ip != '' AND proto = 'tcp' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip, dst_ip, direction fill(null)

SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  instance_id =~ /^$UUID$/ AND dst_ip != '' AND src_ip != '' AND proto = 'udp' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip, dst_ip, direction fill(null)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  instance_id =~ /^$UUID$/ AND dst_ip != '' AND src_ip != '' AND proto = '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip, dst_ip, direction fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "vm.host_alive_status" WITH KEY = "tenant_name" WHERE tenant_id =~ /$TID/
list.label: Tenant
list.name: TENANT
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "vm.host_alive_status" WITH KEY = "tenant_name" WHERE tenant_id =~ /$TID/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "vm.host_alive_status" WITH KEY = "vm_name" WHERE tenant_name =~ /^($TENANT)$/
list.label: hostname
list.name: HOSTNAME
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "vm.host_alive_status" WITH KEY = "vm_name" WHERE tenant_name =~ /^($TENANT)$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "vm.host_alive_status" WITH KEY = "resource_id" WHERE tenant_name =~ /^($TENANT)$/ and vm_name =~ /^($HOSTNAME)$/
list.label: Id
list.name: UUID
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "vm.host_alive_status" WITH KEY = "resource_id" WHERE tenant_name =~ /^($TENANT)$/ and vm_name =~ /^($HOSTNAME)$/
